name: . (maytalan)
description:
"Flytrapped" is a flappybird takeoff done as a part of Art and Interaction course at Bezalel Academy.

Imagine you are a tiny and insecure red fly and you accidentally got trapped in a greenhouse. At first, no worries, you were in this situation before. But, Oh no! It’s not just an ordinary greenhouse -
  It’s a carnivore plants greenhouse!

Try your best to not get trapped by the carnivore plants and stay alive!
